summary:
=== Purchase Information === Review Date: 2015/12/28 Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Steve Purcell'], 'Producers': ['Galyn Susman'], 'Starring': ['Tom Hanks', 'Tim Allen', 'Kristen Schaal'], 'Studio': ['Pixar']} Review Text: Should Have Stopped and Read The Reviews Closer.. ACTUAL MOVIE IS ABOUT 20min, VERY DECEIVING that this says 50min. After the 20 min SHORT movie it's the film makers talking. DID NOT HOLD MY 8yr olds ATTENTION AFTER THE 20 min SHORT ENDED. Review Title: ONLY 20min LONG, THE REST IS AN ADULT TALKING!! Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2016/07/07 Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Byron Howard', 'Rich Moore'], 'Producers': ['Clark Spencer'], 'Starring': ['Ginnifer Goodwin', 'Jason Bateman', 'Idris Elba'], 'Studio': ['Walt Disney Animation Studios']} Review Text: We saw this in the theater and just purchased the film with bonus features. My 9 yr old and I both loved it. Even the part where the animators were talking about researching the characters, the trip going to Africa and how Lassiter wanted animals fully dressed in the movie was very interesting. Review Title: Really Cool Film, Lots of Funny Characters for Kids and Adults. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2017/03/21 Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Kevin MacDonald'], 'Producers': ['Kevin MacDonald', 'Andy Harries', 'Lila V Rawlings', 'Matt Charman', 'Rob Bullock'], 'Starring': ['Richard Madden', 'Anil Kapoor', 'Antje Traue'], 'Studio': ['Amazon Studios']} Review Text: Most of the acting is great for a pilot, it usually takes time for a crew to "gel" together and be fluid, so I was pleasantly surprised. I agree with some of the other reviews, we need more quality SCI FI. So far I like the mystery, and unlike another reviewer, I think the sets, background, etc are realistic especially considering its a "Pilot" and the "darkness" of the settings may have to do with the plot. Id like to Thank Amazon for trying new things, having new visions, and always staying ahead of the pack. 😉 Review Title: Give It The GREEN Light. Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2017/08/12 Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'frightening scenes', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['None'], 'Starring': ['Ruth Blackwell'], 'Studio': ['Independent Documentary']} Review Text: I was SUPER interested until he asked his wife to turn off the smoke detector "using her cell phone"? ? In a strangers house??? How Likely is that..? The fire scene and the return "call to the fire dept" just didnt seem that believable either in my humble opinion...The house is full of smoke and your gonna let your very nonchalant wife hang out upstairs, and NOT BE LIKE" uh Honey you might wanna get your ass out of the house its full of smoke and theres a ghost that plays with the stove..(Call me crazy but I would like my better half to mention that if it were me standing there)..THE concept was great, well done not going overboard which made it more believable and overall Better in my opinion..Interesting there's not alot of info to be found on the maker...Worth watching if this is your thing.. Review Title: REAL, NO.. FAKE, MAYBE.. Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2018/03/21 Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'frightening scenes', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Steven T. Shippy'], 'Producers': ["Steven 'Prozak' Shippy"], 'Starring': ['Steven T. Shippy', 'Prozak', 'Brian Harnois']} Review Text: SPOILER ALERT..
OMG! There’s something right behind you........ Oh No wait that was just the camera guy. Ok Im not saying there’s nothing there, My 2 Stars are for the way the Doc is DRAGGED OUT, the way “music” and sound effects are added to cover up a lot of “the nothing” thats happening and how slow the whole thing moves. There are several “People and Orbs” shown . There's a kinda cool part where what looks to be a guy or maybe one of the crew running by at about 34 mins but you definitely see something, there’s also a “Shadow Man” at around 50 mins, “some footsteps with movement” and a couple of “Cool Orbs moving doors” at about 56 mins. Personally I don’t understand all the “Disembodied Whistles”, “Disembodied Sounds and Talking” etc. that I never really heard anyway. At about 1 hr there’s a “Dark Figure” standing next to a colum. Amazingly at 1:05 we do get to see the “Woman in White” which is VERY COOL. But the scary music and effects they added in my opinion are total overkill, and most of the time are setting up for a BIG let down. The building is awesome but Im a fan of old buildings and architecture. The age, condition and the fact they’re in total darkness helps to add to the feeling that something’s about to happen but sadly it takes awhile. Review Title: There's a kinda cool part where what looks to be a guy or ... Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2018/11/26 Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Paul Wilmshurst', 'David Evans', 'Andy Hay', 'Bill Gallagher'], 'Producers': ['Sue de Beauvoir', 'Richard Fell', 'Bill Gallagher', 'Nigel Marchant', 'Gareth Neame'], 'Starring': ['Naomi Battrick', 'Max Beesley', 'Rachel Colwell']} Review Text: I purchased the PBS Channel to watch Season 2. As I finish Episode 2 I realize it jumps to Episode 8. That is absolutely ridiculous and apparently I NOW see other reviewers are having the same issue. Very Disappointed. Review Title: Season 2 Jumps From Episode 2 To 8. Very Disappointed In Amazon, They Need To Fix This. Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Tudors: The Complete Series Review Date: 2019/08/28 Store: Rated: NR Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Paramount Home Entertainment, Drama Product Description: ['Product Description', 'Relive all the drama and opulence again and again with The Tudors: The Complete Series. This 14-disc set includes all four groundbreaking seasons of the critically acclaimed, award-winning drama from Showtime. The Tudors stands out as one of the most daring and visually beautiful shows ever to grace the small screen. Experience the tumultuous saga of young King Henry VIII, featuring Golden Globe® winner Jonathan Rhys-Meyers, and witness the king’s near-40-year omnipotent and bloody reign, infamous marriages, and controversial decisions that led to the deconstruction of the Roman Catholic Church in 16th Century England.', 'Set Contains:', 'Special Features • Tudors Production Design • Tudors Wardrobe • Tudors Favorite Locations in Contemporary London • The Tower of London • Descendants of Henry • Tudors Timeline • Biographies • Photo Galleries • And More!'] Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Drama/Television, Television/British Television', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, AC-3, Color, Dolby, Box set, Widescreen, NTSC, Dubbed', 'Contributor': 'TUDORS: THE COMPLETE SERIES', 'Language': 'English', 'Number Of Discs': '14', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 1 Pounds', 'Item model number': '947953', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, AC-3, Color, Dolby, Box set, Widescreen, NTSC, Dubbed', 'Run time': '33 hours and 58 minutes', 'Release date': 'November 11, 2014', 'Dubbed': 'Spanish', 'Studio': 'Paramount', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '14'} Review Text: I love historical dramas but this is in a league of it's own. The Tudors has something for everyone. Sex, Scandal, Intrigue, Truth, Lies and Amazing Acting. The sets, backgrounds and scene work makes you feel like you are there, being a part of history.
It's terribly difficult to make a story interesting and to make people hang on the edge of their seats when they already know the ending but somehow The Tudors manages to keep you in the moment.. Review Title: BEST HISTORICAL TV SERIES! A TRUE MASTERPIECE! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2020/09/04 Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Jesus Colmenar', 'Jesus Rodrigo', 'Sandra Gallego', 'David Molina Encinas'], 'Producers': ['Jesús Colmenar', 'Pedro García Caja', 'Álex Pina'], 'Starring': ['Maggie Civantos', 'Najwa Nimri', 'Berta Vazquez']} Review Text: Don’t let the subs scare you away or you’ll miss out on a worth while show. Najwa/Zulema steals the show when it comes to acting! A total Bad-Ass Bit@# that has enough strength for 3 women! Like most long running series it has its ups and downs but stick with it for a hell of a ride. Review Title: Don’t let the Subtitles Scare You Away! This Is Really Well Done & Gritty In A Good Way! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns 4. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- Structure your response as: SUMMARY: [Final synthesis of preferences and patterns]
raw_response:
SUMMARY:  
This individual's purchase patterns reveal a strong affinity for animated films, historical dramas, and content that includes both humor and engaging narratives. They consistently rate family-friendly, animated features highly, particularly those that present interesting content and character development. However, they express dissatisfaction when the content falls short of expectations, particularly regarding length and engagement level for children.

Notable themes in their reviews include a preference for high-quality graphics and narratives that capture both children’s and adults’ attention. There’s an expressed appreciation for detailed production aspects, as seen in their praise for elaborate settings and historical accuracy in dramas. Recurring issues of disappointment arise from perceived inconsistencies, such as abrupt storytelling shifts or misleading marketing about content length.

Quality appears to be crucial; despite occasional price sensitivity, they seem inclined to invest in products delivering strong visual and narrative engagement. The tendency to rate harshly when expectations are not met indicates a distinct standard for content value equally across genres. Overall, this person favors content that merges entertainment with quality storytelling, looking for impactful and thought-provoking viewing experiences.

target_interaction.title: :- Whining, Complaining, Stupidity, Yup Gotta Watch, It’s The Bad Girl's Club
target_interaction.text:
This season had all the usual banter, and of-course the insecure followers Meghan, Erika, Bozo, Fatshley, & Smulie-Julie couldn’t stop the continuous word diarrhea.. hating on anyone that looked better and made them even more insecure than they already are, pretty much any other girl….

The only reason Erika got any screen time was b/c she was out smarted right from the beginning and was used as everybody’s stooge.. I have to give Kudos to Crazy Christina for calling it in the confessional!! she saw pretty quick how Julie took total control of Erika (up till episode 4 ;) lol
Hind sight is 20/20..

Overall painful to watch, like animals on the bottom of the food chain, all the weak girls flock together to try and look like they’re bigger & better than they actually are.. by the end the weakest even try to mate with each other cause they can’t get anything else.

It’s just sad how many people (producers, bar owners, tv channel, etc) get away with exploiting ignorant young morons to this extent…
